title: Why did Ivan Moody leave Five Finger Death Punch? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, from what I read, he left the band last year and checked into rehab. I guess he needed to clean himself up. From what I understand, he performed shows so drunk, he couldn't remember doing them. That's never good.
Requested. I neither know nor care because 5FDP is a kiddie metal band I avoid like the plague.
